Detailed Description

This class represents the objective functional of a multilayer perceptron for the aircraft landing problem. This is an optimal control problem of aeronautical engineering interest, with one control and four state variables, and where the objective functional is evaluated by integrating a system of four ordinary differential equations.

See also:
ObjectiveFunctional.

Definition at line 34 of file AircraftLandingProblem.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Flood::AircraftLandingProblem::AircraftLandingProblem ( MultilayerPerceptron *  newMultilayerPerceptron  ) 

General constructor. It creates an aircraft landing problem objective functional associated to a multilayer perceptron. It also initializes all the problem parameters to their default values:

  • Short period gain = -0.95 (s-1)
  • Path time constant = 2.5 (s)
  • Short period resonant frequency = 1.0 (rad/s)
  • Short period damping factor = 0.5
  • Velocity = 256.0 (ft/s)
  • Landing time = 20.0 (s)
  • Initial pitch angle rate = 0.0 (rad/s)
  • Initial pitch angle = 0.0781 (rad)
  • Initial altitude = velocity*landingTime*tan(-flightPathAngle) // (m)
  • Initial altitude rate = -20.0/3.28084 (m/s)

Parameters:
newMultilayerPerceptron Pointer to a multilayer perceptron object. This neural network will represent the control variable for this system.

Definition at line 47 of file AircraftLandingProblem.cpp.

References altitudeRateWeight, altitudeWeight, elevatorWeight, Flood::MultilayerPerceptron::getNumberOfInputs(), Flood::MultilayerPerceptron::getNumberOfOutputs(), initialAltitude, initialAltitudeRate, initialPitchAngle, initialPitchAngleRate, initialSize, landingAltitudeRateWeight, landingAltitudeWeight, landingPitchAngleRateWeight, landingPitchAngleWeight, landingTime, Flood::ObjectiveFunctional::multilayerPerceptron, ordinaryDifferentialEquations, pathTimeConstant, pi, pitchAngleRateWeight, pitchAngleWeight, Flood::OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::setInitialSize(), Flood::OrdinaryDifferentialEquations::setTolerance(), shortPeriodDampingFactor, shortPeriodGain, shortPeriodResonantFrequency, tolerance, and velocity.

Flood::AircraftLandingProblem::AircraftLandingProblem ( void   ) 

Default constructor. It creates an aircraft landing problem objective functional not associated to any multilayer perceptron. It also initializes all the problem parameters to their default values:

  • Short period gain = -0.95 (s-1)
  • Path time constant = 2.5 (s)
  • Short period resonant frequency = 1.0 (rad/s)
  • Short period damping factor = 0.5
  • Velocity = 256.0 (ft/s)
  • Landing time = 20.0 (s)
  • Initial pitch angle rate = 0.0 (rad/s)
  • Initial pitch angle = 0.0781 (rad)
  • Initial altitude = velocity*landingTime*tan(-flightPathAngle) // (m)
  • Initial altitude rate = -20.0/3.28084 (m/s)
